item.title: 11 Times Cartoons Had ‘Adult Moments’ That You Totally Missed As A Kid
item.dc:creator: Ahsanul Karim
item.description:
You probably remember watching cartoons as a kid, and how innocent and carefree they were. But have you ever gone back and rewatched them as an adult? If so, you’ll know that a lot of classic cartoon episodes had some pretty ‘adult moments’ that you totally missed the first time around. Here are 11 examples […]

The post 11 Times Cartoons Had ‘Adult Moments’ That You Totally Missed As A Kid appeared first on Favology.
item.content:encoded:
You probably remember watching cartoons as a kid, and how innocent and carefree they were. But have you ever gone back and rewatched them as an adult? If so, you’ll know that a lot of classic cartoon episodes had some pretty ‘adult moments’ that you totally missed the first time around.

Here are 11 examples of classic cartoons with ‘adult moments’ that will make you laugh, cringe, and question everything you thought you knew about your childhood favorites.

1 Shrek 2

When Prince Charming arrives at the tower where Fiona is held captive, he discovers the Wolf instead of the princess. The character from the classic fairy tale, Little Red Riding Hood, appears to be entertaining himself by reading an interesting magazine, Pork Illustrated, a play on Sports Illustrated.

2 SpongeBob SquarePants

Sponge Bob watches a TV show in which an actinia dances to sensual music in one of the episodes. The presentation on the screen, based on Bob’s emotion, is not intended for children. It’s no coincidence that as soon as Gary walks into the room, he abruptly changes to the sports station.

This wasn’t only a fantasy made by cartoonists, though. Actinias and sponges sometimes have a symbiotic relationship. However, it is better to tell children about it in a less offensive manner.

3 Cars

Two girls (Mia and Tia) drive up to Lightning McQueen during an after-race photograph with the winners. They introduce themselves as big fans of the racer and suddenly hoist themselves up on their wheels, displaying their “high beams” to the racer. This was designed to resemble how some girls flash rock stars at concerts by lifting up their T-shirts.

4 Hercules

On a date with Meg, Hercules shares his impression of the play they both watched recently. ‚ÄúAnd then that, that play, that, that, that Oedipus thing. Man, I thought I had problems.‚Äù It‚Äôs unclear to kids why Meg is laughing at this joke, while adults familiar with Greek mythology catch the irony.

King Oedipus killed his father and married his mother, oblivious that they were his parents. That is why Hercules claims that his problems are little compared to the trials of poor Oedipus.

5 Tiny Toon Adventures

Daffy Duck is bored at the movies in one of the cartoon series’ episodes, so he begins to browse through a suspiciously named magazine.

6 Ralph Breaks the Internet

In a children’s animation, there’s another not-suitable-for-kids incident. In the scene where Vanellope enters a Disney princess’s room, the princesses demonstrate their readiness to defend their domain from an intruder. Cinderella is the one who becomes enraged, breaking her shoe in the same way that men shatter bottles in bars during brawls, resulting in a homemade shiv.

7 Frozen II

This animation contains a great adult joke. Anna has an odd reaction when Kristoff appears in front of her all dressed up, reminding her that he only put it on for an hour. “I prefer you in leather anyway,” she says as she kisses her boyfriend and strokes his hair. Kristoff feels embarrassed by these remarks, and he grins stupidly.

8 Zootopia

When Judy and Nick go to the nudist club, the poor bunny is uncomfortable and doesn’t know where to hide her eyes. Of course, that’s exactly the response the cunning fox was looking for.

9 Toy Story

In the first part of the film, Andy’s favorite toy, Woody, advises his companions not to be concerned about Andy’s birthday and new gifts. All of the toys do not share Woody’s calm demeanor. Mr. Potato Head expresses his disapproval of Woody’s viewpoint. When Slinky defends Woody, Mr. Potato Head moves his lips behind his back, thereby labeling Slinky a “butt kisser.”

The story’s first half turned out to be full of mature jokes. Bo Peep thanks Woody for rescuing her sheep at the start of the film. She says a curious phrase: ‚ÄúWhat do you say I get someone else to watch the sheep tonight?‚Äù In response to this, the sheriff laughs stupidly and says only one thing: ‚ÄúOh, yes.‚Äù

10 Tarzan

When Jane draws Tarzan, she explains to her father what things she found to be unusual in this strange man and says, ‚ÄúAnd his eyes were intense and focused and‚Ä¶I‚Äôve never seen such eyes.‚Äù Professor Porter notices his daughter‚Äôs feelings and jokes, ‚ÄúShould I leave you and the blackboard alone for a moment?‚Äù

11 Hotel Transylvania

“I was just in the pool,” the embarrassed monster replies after Wayne the Werewolf removes the invisible man’s swimming trunks. ” The water is cold. Don’t judge on me!”

So, which one of these cartoons gave you the biggest surprise? Do you remember any other adult moments in cartoons that we missed? Share with us in the comments below. And don‚Äôt forget to share this post with your friends ‚Äì they‚Äôll definitely get a kick out of it!

The post 11 Times Cartoons Had ‘Adult Moments’ That You Totally Missed As A Kid appeared first on Favology.

item.title: 13 Famous Brand Names You’re Probably Mispronouncing
item.dc:creator: Ahsanul Karim
item.description:
Brand names can be tricky to pronounce. Sometimes they sound different than you expect, or the company name is difficult to say correctly. Here are thirteen popular brand names that you may be pronouncing incorrectly. Don’t feel bad if you’ve been saying them wrong for years – a lot of people do! But now that […]

The post 13 Famous Brand Names You’re Probably Mispronouncing appeared first on Favology.
item.content:encoded:
Brand names can be tricky to pronounce. Sometimes they sound different than you expect, or the company name is difficult to say correctly.

Here are thirteen popular brand names that you may be pronouncing incorrectly.

Don’t feel bad if you’ve been saying them wrong for years – a lot of people do! But now that you know how to say them correctly, you can impress your friends and colleagues with your knowledge of branding.

Ready to learn? Let’s go!

1 Adidas

2 Nike

3 Adobe

4 Asus

5 Benetton

6 Hermes

7 Lamborghini

8 Louis Vuitton

9 Renault

10 Stella Atois

11 Van Heusen

12 Yves Saint Laurent

13 Volkswagen

In this blog post, we‚Äôve shared 13 popular brands that you may have been pronouncing wrong. We hope it has helped to clear up some confusion and given you a few chuckles along the way. With any luck, knowing how these well-known companies are really pronounced will help when talking about them in person or on social media!

Don’t forget to share this article with your friends who might be interested too

The post 13 Famous Brand Names You’re Probably Mispronouncing appeared first on Favology.

item.title: 30 Sad But True Comics Show How Smartphones Have Taken Over Our Lives
item.dc:creator: Ahsanul Karim
item.description: The post 30 Sad But True Comics Show How Smartphones Have Taken Over Our Lives appeared first on Favology.
item.content:encoded:
Modern technology has undeniably enhanced our lives in several ways, from healing once-terminal illnesses to space explorations. We must all agree that life without technology now appears to be nearly impossible. Though technology makes life easier, it is also the source of a slew of social problems, the most prominent of which is smartphone addiction.

We are more connected than ever before thanks to cell phones, yet unplugging is also more unpleasant. The following comics depict some of the funny and not so funny side consequences of our social media addiction.

Scrolling down to check out the dark drawings for yourself. Though these comics may appear to be funny, the issues they address are concerning to many of us, and hopefully, you will not find yourself in these dark images.

1 But first, let me take a selfie‚Ä¶

2 Reality is often disappointing.

3 Sad but true.

4 Modern date nowadays.

5 What’s wrong with our screen-saturated culture?

6 Scary new generation.

7 The Lord knocks on the door of our heart. Maybe we have put up a small sign that says: “Do not disturb”?

8 The light of ever-glowing screens.

9 A Binky indeed!

10 Love flew away from our heart all alone.

11 Unfortunate bonding we are in.

12 Modern solutions with destructive ideas.

13 Childhood destroyed in seconds.

14 The notification from hell.

15 No more family gathering.

16 The completion of fools.

17 Hope it speaks for us someday.

18 Technological slavery.

19 The screen trap.

20 Things with no essential value in real life.

21 Teach your child this: “No electronics at the dinner table”

22 When sharing is important than dying?

23 The last status.

24 Real life meme.

25 The disappointing future.

26 Taking photo is a must everywhere you step.

27 The real drug nobody cares for.

28 Too busy to wait.

29 Definitely not the right way.

30 It was never true.

No. 3, 4, and 9 would be our top three choices if we had to choose only three. How about you? Let us know in the comments section. And don’t forget to share this article with your friends who are addicted to phones.

The post 30 Sad But True Comics Show How Smartphones Have Taken Over Our Lives appeared first on Favology.

item.title: 30 Nominees For The “Not My Job” Awards – Who is The Winner?
item.dc:creator: Ahsanul Karim
item.description:
The most accurate definition of laziness may be found in this collection. These individuals believed it was not their duty, and as a result, they were unable to complete their jobs. Technically, they performed the work... but let's just say they went for the easy route. Sure, moving the tree out of the way wasn't part of the painter's job description, but he should've done it. Check out the hilarious images and tell your friends about them!

The post 30 Nominees For The “Not My Job” Awards – Who is The Winner? appeared first on Favology.
item.content:encoded:
The most accurate definition of laziness may be found in this collection. These individuals believed it was not their duty, and as a result, they were unable to complete their jobs. Technically, they performed the work‚Ä¶ but let’s just say they went for the easy route. Sure, moving the tree out of the way wasn’t part of the painter’s job description, but he should’ve done it.

Check out the hilarious images, and tell your friends about them!

1 The Ninja Turtles will have to take the next one

2 In case of emergency…

3 When your man says he needs ”guy time”

4 I Love thith threet thign – Mike Tyson

5 When life gives you lemons‚Ä¶

6 Please stand behind the yellow line

7 Abstract art

8 A no smoking sign on the moon

9 Time waits for no one

10 Why fit in when you were made to stand out

11 Private parking

12 Gamers love challenges

13 Watch that last step, grandpa

14 Tetris champ

15 The perfect drunk driving test

16 In the end, we all have to take care of our own shit

17 When it rains, it pours

18 When God closes a door, he opens another

19 Definitely not my job!!

20 What a bike!!

21 Visual merchandising skill = Master

22 Take the unexplored path

23 Your new house comes with three bedrooms, four baths and one ladder

24 The tape is mightier than the welding machine

25 Sorry, not my job!

26 Horizontally mounted doors: For people who like to step out of the house like a turkey out of the oven

27 Trick or treat

28 Not my job!

29 Fixed it!

30 There, it’s done!

What are your thoughts on these people? Let us know in the comments below. And don‚Äôt forget to share with your lazy friends as well.

The post 30 Nominees For The “Not My Job” Awards – Who is The Winner? appeared first on Favology.

item.title: 30+ Funny Comics By Legendary Cartoonist Will Make You Smile
item.dc:creator: Ahsanul Karim
item.description: The post 30+ Funny Comics By Legendary Cartoonist Will Make You Smile appeared first on Favology.
item.content:encoded:
Reaching this impressive age as a cartoonist is an amazing feat, but what‚Äôs even more astonishing is that Mr. Parisi shows no sign of stopping any time soon. In fact, his cartoons only seem to be getting better with age! If you don‚Äôt believe me, take a look for yourself. Here are 30 of his latest and greatest cartoons, guaranteed to make you smile. 

1. Such a Badass Grandma.

2. Wire you saying that…

3. Evil. Truly heinous crimes.

4. Well‚Ä¶ It is natural.

5. Kitty Anatomy.

6. Men will be men.

7. Lockdown.

8. The garlic costume.

9. Sure kid let’s do lunch.

10. About to be squeezed

11. And they lived happily ever after.

12. Too late.

13. Best weighted blanket ever.

14. Sometimes, I hurt and kill. That’s basically all.

15. Wishcado.

16. Caught in the act.

17. Seems to be working.

18. Understandable.

19. That cat really can’t control itself.

20. Work from home.

21. Cheeky cat.

22. Making it much worse.

23. That is so embarrassing.

24. Hanging out in a garden sounds fun.

25. Well what did you expect?

26. He doesn’t look too happy about that.

27. Teenagers…

28. We all know he’s using Apple Maps.

29. Nightmare.

30. Tasteless? Might need 6 herbs and 7 spices.

31. Chews your battles.

All image ¬©️ Mark Parisi | Instagram  offthemark.com

The post 30+ Funny Comics By Legendary Cartoonist Will Make You Smile appeared first on Favology.

item.title: This Artist Creates Dark Comics With Twisted Endings
item.dc:creator: Ahsanul Karim
item.description: The post This Artist Creates Dark Comics With Twisted Endings appeared first on Favology.
item.content:encoded:
Dark humor is adored by many comic book fans. People crave the excitement and twists that come with reading comic books, especially in the form of dark humor.

Many artists, on the other hand, are averse to doing things that are both complicated and paradoxical. Alan, a well-known artist, has a unique method of crafting plots and can produce an extensive story in numerous panels, which people adore.

Alan is a part-time artist in the United States who also works as a web developer. Alan explained that fan art, including video game characters, motivated him to pursue digital art. But, recognizing that the joy of creating comics might be far greater, the artist began to think about his own artistic ideas and produced a story.

The artist has 1,100 Instagram followers and lately begun posting on social media under the name Combo Deluxe. Their art is funny and has a touch of black humor, all while making people laugh and enjoy themselves.

We believe Alan is deserving of more followers based on his work. Alan’s art is always enjoyable to look at.

Take a look for yourself by scrolling below.

1. Easy Mode.

2. Papa Prophecy.

3. One Knight Stand.

4. Limited Plan.

5. Chip Conspiracy.

6. Costumed Subparhero.

7. Political Energy.

8. Meet the Mob Family.

9. Angry Bird.

10. One haircut.

11. The Tooth Fairies.

12. Squirrel Talk.

13. The Informal Paranormal.

14. Maple Monster.

15. Delivery Hero.

16. Among Birdseed Thieves.

17. Saving the Oceans.

18. The Monster.

19. Surfaced Tension.

20. PogChamp?

21. Cat Infestation.

22. Ghost loops.

23. New Year’s Resolution.

24. Combo Meals.

25. Garbage Hole.

26. Smarter Devices.

27. Basically Reality.

28. The First Date.

29. The Social Mob.

30. Seems fishy…

31. Value Meal.

How do you feel about these comics? Please let us know in the comments section below. Don’t forget to tell your friends.

All images ¬©️ Alan (Instagram)

The post This Artist Creates Dark Comics With Twisted Endings appeared first on Favology.

item.title: Genius Photographer Uses Forced Perspective to Create Amazing Superhero Pics
item.dc:creator: Ahsanul Karim
item.description: The post Genius Photographer Uses Forced Perspective to Create Amazing Superhero Pics appeared first on Favology.
item.content:encoded:
Everybody needs a hobby…

Ever wondered what it‚Äôs like living with superheroes? It might seem entirely impossible ‚Äî until you meet Wire Hon. This toy collector from Malaysia has somehow managed to pull it off with the help of a clever camera technique. Using forced perspective, Wire Hon captures fun shots of his action figures and make them appear life-size.

Scroll down the page and see the epic photo manipulations for yourself!

1. Let me help you Mr. stark.

Behind the scenes.

2. Clean that shit right now!

Behind the scenes.

3. Superhero pose.

Behind the scenes.

4. Keep it right there.

5. Men will be men.

6. Is that yours mister?

7. Heroception.

8. Artist Deadpool.

9. Give me all you have.

10. Boom.

11. Say cheese…

12. Upstairs.

13. Drink break.

14. Pika Pika.

15. But… I’m Batman!

16. You think, you can get me that?

17. No fighting in the house.

18. Wanna lift?

19. Hands up.

20. Bucky?

All images ¬©️ Wire Hon. We highly recommend visiting his Instagram (@wirehon) for more epic photography like these.

The post Genius Photographer Uses Forced Perspective to Create Amazing Superhero Pics appeared first on Favology.

item.title: Funny Photos Taken Right Before Disaster Strikes
item.dc:creator: Ahsanul Karim
item.description: The post Funny Photos Taken Right Before Disaster Strikes appeared first on Favology.
item.content:encoded:
Sometimes somebody takes a photograph so perfectly timed that it can never be recreated, no matter how hard you try. Some of these photos are so perfect that you can‚Äôt help but wonder whether the photographers knew about the accident before it even happened. But lets not get carried away with conspiracy theories. Not all photographers are stalkers and sociopaths with diabolical plans.

If you want to see how it looks like before disaster strikes, you‚Äôre at the right place. We have listed 25 funny photos right before disaster strikes.

Keep scrolling and have fun, folks.

1. Run!

2. Something is about to go down!

3. Yeah! Cheers!

4. We are looking at that aim too.

5. Time to get showered.

6. The Cow Took Off!

7. We’re gonna have a problem here.

8. A Perfectly timed family photo.

9. I can fly!

10. Watch out, buddy!

11. Now Take This.

12. When the Glass is Drunk!

13. I will just swim through the air.

14. No balls? Fine, I will catch the bubble!

15. Now who‚Äôs on the ground?

16. Happy Birthday? Maybe not!

17. Watch out you big fella!

18. I ain‚Äôt no Jesus!

19. When you ‚ÄòBreak It‚Äô so hard!

20. Juggling, but to the downstairs!

21. Hey! Where is my space?

22. So happy to see the ball!

23. A Perfect shot.

24. Let‚Äôs taste the HotDog!

25. Someone’s getting wet today.

Share this article and let us know which one is your favorite in the comments section.

The post Funny Photos Taken Right Before Disaster Strikes appeared first on Favology.

item.title: Guy Photoshops Himself Into His Childhood Pics, And The Results Are Too Realistic
item.dc:creator: Ahsanul Karim
item.description: The post Guy Photoshops Himself Into His Childhood Pics, And The Results Are Too Realistic appeared first on Favology.
item.content:encoded:
What can someone do with a set of great Photoshop skills? Yes, they can create beautiful digital art and edit amazing photos. But can they travel back in time? In this case, it seems like they can!

Conor Nickerson, a Montreal-based photographer, used Photoshop to travel back in time to hang out with his younger self. Tho it is not in any scientific way, Conor photoshopped his present self into his childhood photos from 1997-2005 and as you can see, he‚Äôs quite successful to do so.

While looking at some old photos Conor imagined how it would be like to be in them with his present self. He wasted no more time, grabbed his old hats and tees, and went for it. But obviously going back in time is a challenging task whether it is in a scientific way or in photoshop.

‚ÄúIt involved a lot of blurring, sharpening, and noise to try to get it to look like an older photo,‚Äù says Conor about the challenge he faced during the project. So why are we wasting our time? Let’s check out the amazing project.

1. Playing music with the younger self.

2. Cool dudes.

3. On a train.

4. Happy birthday, Grandma.

5. Cool dudes in suits.

6. ¬†Opening presents.

7. Outside.

8. Conor with his brother and younger self.

9. Just hanging out.

10. ¬†In an orchard.

11. Inside.

Seen a cooler Photoshop project recently? Share with us in the comments section below.
All images ¬©️ Conor Nickerson.

The post Guy Photoshops Himself Into His Childhood Pics, And The Results Are Too Realistic appeared first on Favology.

item.title: 20 Times Pets Almost Gave Their Owners Heart Attacks
item.dc:creator: Ahsanul Karim
item.description: The post 20 Times Pets Almost Gave Their Owners Heart Attacks appeared first on Favology.
item.content:encoded:
Is your pet normal?

It’s important to understand the commitment you’re making when you want to welcome a pet into your house and make them a new family member. Pets are a big responsibility, and you should treat them as if they were your child. There’s a lot that can go wrong, and you’ll be held responsible if it does. All animals, whether they are a dog, a cat, or even a bunny, require attention, time, and affection.

When you have a furry buddy, you should consider their safety and well-being as a first priority. Pet owners will go to any lengths to protect their little babies. On a cold night, they would offer them blankets, food, time, play with them, and even make them sleep in their bed with them! Keeping an eye on them is always a good idea because anything scary can happen to them in a fraction of a second. Pets are fragile, and despite their best efforts, they might find themselves in tough and dangerous situations. As a result, it is the owner’s job and responsibility to keep an eye on their pet.

Our partners, on the other hand, can sometimes catch us off guard. They have the ability to send us into panic mode, but we don’t know if this is done intentionally or unintentionally! That is a puzzle. There’s still no reason to worry your owners like that, but I doubt their pets would ever understand! Animals may do anything to scare you away, from applying tomato paste (which looks like blood) to sleeping like they’re dead.

Here are a few of those photographs that will make you look again, if not three times, to fully realize what is going on. Scroll down and have a good time!

1. This one would have given me a legit heart attack too!

2. Courage the cowardly dog minus the purple color.

3. Is that part of his tail or poop?

A twitter user by the name of _sumola_(https://twitter.com/_sumola_) posts images of her cat, and one of the photos she shared appeared to have the cat’s tail sliced off. Yikes! This lady resides in the city of Ottawa, Ontario. Void is her black cat, and he is basically Tally’s (Sumola’s roommate) cat. “As Void is the darkest, he prefers to act very secretive,” Tally stated in an interview. He is, however, a giant dork. To ask for pats, he will reach out his paw (nails included on occasion) and pet you.”

Tally also believes that giving its owner a heart attack is both necessary and enjoyable for two reasons. “First, they’re little nasty gremlins who thrive on suffering, and second, they like the way you treat them afterward, Tallys explains.

“He prefers to sit in the darkest of spots, whether it my laundry basket, beneath the bed, bookcase, or closet,” said Void, who is totally black. “Other than him,” Tally added sarcastically, Void wants to make sure no other demons can assault her.

In her conversation, Tally also brings up the wonderful concept of adoption. Adoption is a lovely gesture that has numerous advantages, not only for the animals but also for the shelters. “Don’t shop, adopt!” “Yes, Void’s name was UnaVoidable,” she added. That bit had to happen, right? 

4. Dead bunny or a sleeping bunny?

5. The kind of gift no one wants‚Ä¶.

6. When doggo wants a biscuit at 3 am.

7. Creepy stalker alert!

Pets provide us with a great deal of joy and happiness. All pet owners will be able to relate to this statement. Pets can assist in the reduction of stress. They are indeed magical, since they have the ability to lighten our gloomy days simply by cuddling us. They are extremely loyal and devoted. They will make a lovely companion for you. It is vital to love them, but loving them can sometimes bring difficulties.

Megan MacCutcheon, a psychologist, believes that owning a pet poses a constant risk of stress. “Things include adjusting to owning a new pet, training a pet, acquainting new pets with existing pets, introducing pets and children, and finding solutions to varied obligations such as pet sitting, dog walking, and so on.”

When you have a pet and love them wholeheartedly, it’s impossible to face the fact that they will die one day. And you’ll either have to do without them or they’ll have to do without you. This is such a sad concept. “While many pets appear to be eternally young, they do grow older, their health deteriorates, and we are burdened with even more obligations as we deal with the added chores and expectations that come with caring for an aged or sick animal.”

8. When you drink a little too much‚Ä¶

9. Dog finally caught its tail‚Ä¶

10. An extra leg?

11. Dogo with vampire‚Äôs teeth‚Ä¶

12. Imagine seeing this in the middle of a forest‚Ä¶

13. What the hell is this supposed to be?

14. Not even sorry.

15. Imagine going for a morning walk and coming across this thing.

When you have a pet, you treat them as if they were your child, and even a scratch on their body causes you to get concerned. Because that is the nature of the pet-owner relationship. You must prioritize their health over your own and keep an eye on them at all times. However, one must accept the fact that they will not live indefinitely. And seeing their health deteriorate and them become ill is undoubtedly a terrible experience for the owners. Megan refers to it as “pet owner anxiety.”

Pet owners bear a great deal of duty, which comes with the anxiety of fulfilling that commitment. It can also be highly stressful. Seeing your pets in agony can create a great deal of anxiety and stress. Your dogs suffering from a sickness and your decisions to euthanize them, their lives dependent on you and your decisions, all of these scenarios can be quite stressful.

However, this is only true for persons who regard their dogs to be members of their family. There are those who consider their pets to be nothing more than pets and have no emotional attachment to them. They are unconcerned about them. When you become emotionally attached to your pet, everything else fades into the background. And because your sentiments are involved, you don’t want to be practical all of the time

16. WHO POISONED THIS DOGGO!?

17. We have a serial killer in the house.

18. Please reassemble correctly!

19. Doggo, you will break your neck‚Ä¶

20. I would faint‚Ä¶

And now that we’ve reached the end, you may put your panic mode to rest. The point of this post was to show how much we love our dogs and how terrified we would be if something bad happened to them! It was frightening at first, but it turned out to be hilarious!

Have you ever witnessed one of your dogs doing something unexpected that made you jump out of your skin? If so, please share your thoughts in the comments area below. Also, please feel free to comment on this page with your ideas and opinions.

The post 20 Times Pets Almost Gave Their Owners Heart Attacks appeared first on Favology.
